text: Curtain is a 1920 American silent drama film directed by James Young and starring Katherine MacDonald, Edwin B. Tilton and Earl Whitlock.Goble p.493 ==Cast== * Katherine MacDonald as Nancy Bradshaw * Edwin B. Tilton as Jerry Coghlan * Earl Whitlock as Ted Dorn * Charles Richman as Dick Cunningham * Florence Deshon as Lila Grant ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:1920 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by James Young Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:American black-and-white films Category:First National Pictures films
title: Curtain (film)
